title: Abingdon quad bike rider seriously hurt in crash
article: A quad bike rider is in hospital with serious injuries after crashing into a house, police have said. The man, in his 20s, hit the property in East St Helen Street, in Abingdon, Oxfordshire, at 13:05 GMT on Sunday.He was taken to hospital where he is said to be in a stable condition. Thames Valley Police has asked anyone who captured the crash on a dashcam or who saw what happened to come forward with information. Follow BBC South on Facebook , Twitter , or Instagram .
